duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide professional services relating to the care and treatment of hair, nails, and skin to salon clientele.
Meet or exceed personal service and retail sales goals.
Recruit and maintain clientele by providing quality service and product recommendations.
Respond professionally to customer service issues and promptly address complaints.
Maintenance of personal work area and salon to meet State Board Regulations.
Continuing education on products, services, and current issues relating to the industry.

education_certification.credential: Valid and current board certified license in cosmetology.
Two to five years of experience in the cosmetology or cosmetic industry preferred.
